definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
to offer/to present/to dedicate/to donate/to show/to put on display/worthy person (old)

sentences.english: All references given must be referred to in the main body of the thesis.
sentences.chinese: 所以列出的參考文獻必須與論文的主題相關聯。

sentences.english: Network function of references based on Web-links.
sentences.chinese: 參考文獻的網絡功能基於網絡鏈接產生。

sentences.english: Don't forget about such things as literature review and bibliography .
sentences.chinese: 不要忘記文獻評論和參考文獻。

sentences.english: Central Limit Theorem could be read-up from the references indicated.
sentences.chinese: 中心極限定理“將從顯示的參考文獻中詳細研究。

sentences.english: The words of references are used confusedly, and haven't changed for many years.
sentences.chinese: 參考文獻用語使用混亂的狀況多年來沒有改觀。

sentences.english: After the main text the reference documents, the introduction and contact of the author should be written.
sentences.chinese: 正文後列出參考文獻和第一作者簡介及通訊方式。

sentences.english: And you know what Bundy is like with references.
sentences.chinese: 而且你知道邦迪是那麼在乎參考文獻。

sentences.english: Surelyreference works need to be compiled by experts?
sentences.chinese: 參考文獻真的需要專家編著嗎？

sentences.english: This paper has 21 figures, 5 tables and 15 references.
sentences.chinese: 本論文包括圖21幅，表5個，參考文獻15篇。

sentences.english: The simulation results are in good agreement with that obtained by comme…
sentences.chinese: 數值仿真結果與參考文獻和商用軟件計算結果一致。

sentences.english: The progress on the synthesis of sulfones by oxidation of sulfides or sulfides is reviewed with 50 references.
sentences.chinese: 對氧化硫醚或亞碸的方法作一評述，參考文獻50篇。

sentences.english: A more detailed description of this work can be found in Ref. 41.
sentences.chinese: 參考文獻41對這方面的工作有更爲詳盡的闡述。

sentences.english: Realize that your references are very important in essays. They even lend credibility to your research.
sentences.chinese: 論文的參考文獻很重要，甚至能爲你的課題增光添彩。

sentences.english: Check that the reference appears correctly.
sentences.chinese: 檢查參考文獻是否準確。

sentences.english: Select the first reference and double-click to open the reference tab.
sentences.chinese: 選擇第一個參考文獻，雙擊打開參考文獻標籤頁。

sentences.english: Select the first reference and double-click to open the reference tab.
sentences.chinese: 選擇第一個參考文獻，雙擊打開參考文獻標籤頁。

definition: variant of 匯編|汇编[hui4 bian1]
to translate and edit/translator-editor/(computing) to compile (source code)
Hanyu Da Cidian, the largest Chinese dictionary, with over 375,000 word entries, first published 1986-1994
surname Adorno/Theodor Ludwig Wiesengrund Adorno 狄奧多·阿多諾|狄奥多·阿多诺[Di2 ao4 duo1 · A1 duo1 nuo4] (1903-1969), German sociologist, philosopher, musicologist, and composer
to annotate/to add marginal comments on/criticism/marginalia
